title: The Battle of the Bulge and children of the Holocaust
itunes:title: The Battle of the Bulge and children of the Holocaust
itunes:subtitle: Military historian Antony Beevor offers a fresh interpretation of the 1944 Ardennes offensive that represented Hitler's final attempt to turn the tide of the war. Meanwhile, journalist Wendy Holden tells the remarkable tale of three young wom...
description:
Military historian Antony Beevor offers a fresh interpretation of the 1944 Ardennes offensive that represented Hitler's final attempt to turn the tide of the war. Meanwhile, journalist Wendy Holden tells the remarkable tale of three young women who gave birth while in Nazi captivity. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
